document_data.mainbody:
uinsoo was a magical dagger that could be thrown at enemies.
This unique weapon was found in the upper Waterdeep sewers. The Heroes of Waterdeep, having entered the first floor of the sewers, may have come across a collection of magical scrolls on a shelf. The enchanted dagger, Guinsoo, appeared by placing an ordinary dagger on to the shelf.The clue to acquire Guinsoo was "The magic that appears to protect may also empower a weapon...". The magical weapon had a +4 enchantment.
